page.title: 10Leisure And Recreation
page.content: Grassland and woodland exist within the block and these together with the golfcourse provide opportunities for people to enjoy their free time. Football pitches, bowling greens, sports clubs,tennis courts,and horse riding facilities are available.Many people own dogs and much time is spent exercising them.Jogging is a popular pastime and many people seem to become engaged in this pursuit as a means of keeping fit.Swimming facilities are provided at Wingfield pool and Concord park pool. Public houses in the area provide a range of activities for people to enjoy including darts, quiz nights, fishing club meetings, football club meetings, besides food and drink. Children increasingly attend due to childrens rooms and playgrounds.
